release.action: Moved log file for unit tests into target folder.
Updated to Tika 0.4
Removed dependency to build213-svnkit-1.2-patch and added dependency to commons-lang 2.1
Updated version number to represent the current development line (0.6.2-SNAPSHOT).
Moved the quartz.properties file into the etc folder of the distribution instead of hiding it within the jar file. Simplifies configuration for the user.
Improved the output of --help option with the provided path.
Enhanced the output in case of an authentication error or using an wrong URL.
Removed overwritten getFuzzyQuery from CustomQueryParser class.
There had a problemw with recognizing of README files or files without extensions. This was based on wrong implementation in the FileName class. Complete reimplemented the class.

release.description: Bug Fix and Minor Enhancement Release
release.action: There had been a problem with scheduled scanning of a repository, cause after a change there had be done a full scan of the repository instead of scanning the new revisions only.
Now you can use the --xml option at the search command to produce an xml file as result output.
Now you can search for propery values as well Take a look at the issue for further explanations.
The PDFSUBJECT field has not been filled correctly. The PDFTITLE field was used instead.
Now the size information about a file will be stored into the index (FieldNames.SIZE).
Now you can use --fromrev HEAD to scan the HEAD revision only.
Fixed Bug in interceptors calculation of percentage rate.
We now can recognize Tags/Branches and Maven Tags and the information is stored into the index and can be queried.
Now you can decide to scan the contents of archive files or not by changing the fileextension.properties files to appropiate values.
Added .c, .h, .m4, .texi, .po file extensions. They will handled as usual text files.
Updated the dependency for commons-cli2 with an classifier.
Problem to identify .project/.classpath as file extensions has now been fixed.
Now we have different packages for Unix and Windows
Removed deprected calls to IndexWriter constructors.
The scan command is not possible without an --url option.
During the command line scan we log information on the console.
Now we parse archives like zip, tar.gz
Now we can scan OpenOffice Files (ODS, ODP, ODT file types).
Refactored out the query code from the unit tests to be used by the command line interface as well.

Added etc directory to the delivery package and put the log4j.properties file into it. You can control the behaviour now from outside the application by just simply changing the contents of log4j.properties.
Removed support for one-jar in build process.
We use now the appassembler-maven-plugin to produce the batch file to call supose from command line.
Fixed problem with recognizing directories which have been deleled and make correct entries for filename and path.
We can recognize Subversion Tags as the Subversion team uses for labeling of the Subversion Releases. They use complex tags.
Fixed typo in link
File encoding set for copying via maven resources plugin
Wrong dependencies in supose.cmd file given.
Support of docx, xlsx and pptx file types.
Update doxia-maven-plugin from 1.0-alpha-10 to 1.1
Finalized version of maven-site-plugin (2.0)
Updated ini4j from 0.4.1 to 0.5.1
Updated SVNKit from 1.2.2 to 1.2.3.
Now we have the filename stored as the filename whereas the path is stored separateley in path. Searches will be done internally lowercase for filenames as well as for paths.
Removed print outs to console from unit tests.
- Make interuption of scan process possible via signal handler.
- Fixed some problems with pom.xml and new release of Maven
- The pipe symbol is currently not supported by SVNKit library so neither we can support it.
- Updated ini4j to release 0.4.1
- Updated to Tika release 0.3
- Searching with multiple wildcards is now working.
- Rescanning of repository after restart in scheduler mode.
- SCM URL wasn't ok for Online distribution.
- Fixed URL to issue tracking system in generated site.
- Integrated branch /branches/R_0.5.0.1 with Bugfix
- Fixed missing dependency for commons-collections.
- Removed references to Hits; Using different approach.
- Added URL for project.
- Removed references to different identifiers which are deprecated.
- After update supose.cmd does not work anymore.
- Enhance Documentation.
- Removed Repository dependencies from POM.
- Updated to Quartz 1.6.4.
- Removed Ant Support from project.
- Updated to SVNKit 1.2.2.5405 build.
- Add search-examples.txt file to the distribution archived.
- Fixed assembly configuration file for bin distribution not to doulbe supose jar file.
- Updated to SVNKit 1.2.0
- Update ini4j to 0.3.2 using classifier.
- Removing of test-output folder added.
- New Formats XML, HTML and RTF are now being parsed.
- Updated all License Header informations
- Indexing the properties in the correct way.
- Integration of Tika for parsing different document types.
- Update to Lucene 2.4.0
- Calling of supose.cmd fixed, cause of changed dependencies.
- Using of revision ranges and single revisions now working
- Update to 0.5.0-SNAPSHOT
- Linking in changes report was wrong.
- Change URL to new Issue tracking system.
- Create a single jar application.
- Output on CLI is now sorted based on the revision number.
- Used submitted patch for scanning documents without extension
- Missed to update the correct revision/date for the POI jar files.
- Removed doubled http in ci management in profiles.xml file.
- Missed the locally stored jar files and source for Eclipse environment.
- Update to Lucene 2.3.1.
- Problem with profiles fixed.
- External profiles file instead of POM inline profiles.
- Update POI to 3.0.2
- Build of different files now working via Maven
- Added contributors
- Added mission directory.properties to distribution
- No prefix for the destination index
- Don't index svn:wc properties
- Wrong indexing fixed for contents of non binary files
- Update copyright year
- Branch created to start working on Milestone
- Scanning of Java files
- Removed directories which had created by the unit tests.
- Fixed missing dependencies in Windows command file
- Fixed Maven2 compiling
- Calling from Windows command line does not work
- Integrated branches/B_QUARTZ to /trunk (R:32-67)
- Full release information in MANIFEST.MF file.
- Added --configbase to define the configuration file storage.
- Added missing long option for HELP
- Scan revision 1 if we run for the first time
- Integrated Bugfix from branch into branches/B_QUARTZ
- Added merge command for CLI to merge indexes
- Scanning via Quartz
- update changes file
- Maven2 build
- Create source distribution
- Source distribution.
- Fixed scanning problem for large documents without partiuclar indexer.
- Printout usage.
- Scan repository considering option --fromrev, --torev.
- Partilly scan repository (--create for index).
- Some files shouldn't be scanned (binary files in particular)
- Refactor to simplifiy getting files from repository.
- Select fields which will be printed out based on result set.
- Search command on CLI
- Index all properties file/directory
- No index entries for copied files.
- Make directories searchable itself.
- Make deleted files as entries
- Enhance searchability in log message
- Create option to define the index.
- Create distribution.
- Command line callable.
- Extract information from PDF files.
- Scan any other kind of documents.
- Extracting information from Excel files.
- Extracting information from PowerPoint files.
